reviews.review_msg: Very challenging course. Very practical course. I learned a lot. You must do a lot of homework before going to lecture. Custom textbook is 30 dollars, just two chapters from a book that sells for less than 50 dollars online.

Brilliant teacher! Jan is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the topics he taught us in class. Relating course material to real world events is also very helpful. I learned a great deal in his course. Preparation before class is essential to get the most out of his lectures. His teaching style is for mature students who inspire to learn.
